cause.description:
this group is about children who never get a good childhood, spouses afraid of there spouse, kids afraid of mental abuse in schools or in public areas.
to make sure that the school system comes down harder on the children who abuse the children around them.
various types of abuse are:
mental abuse physical abuse child abuse spouse abuse pet or animal abuse social abuse sexual abuse and spirtual abuse
this group is to mearly raise awareness about the forms of abuse and to ensure a greater living for all those which the above abuses aply to.
1. raise awareness
2. stop abuse
3. let people know that they are not alone
4. longer sentences for abusers
cause.mission: to make the message clear about any form of abuse
